snippet.title: Fear Of The Darkness - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer Fear Of The Darkness, an innovative psychological horror game released few days ago on Steam!

Do you know for sure what's hiding in the dark?

Look carefully, get closer, and now...

Sink!

Down in the most enveloping darkness, ready to be hunted.

In an increasingly smaller space, you want to escape but you can't, someone shows you the way, reaching the light seems impossible.

You are a doctor, good but a little alternative in your methods, who perhaps has gone too far into the abyss of the human mind, will you now be able to save yourself or will fears dominate you?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1793200/Fear_Of_The_Darkness/
